resources.string: Do you want to find your twin?
Just send a selfie of yourself to see your twin.
Here is an open-source project which shows sweet & original onboarding ViewPagers that follows Material Design Guidelines
We use Lottie Animations on our Intro to make it interactive & pleasant. Did you already tried it ? If no, let\'s start now. It\'s just awesome
Our mission is to make useful & subtle apps. We love help people to save time with open-source stuffs, but we also make life easier by creating new things. Good Coding!
By continuing on this application you agree to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
Please choose whether the person who is your twin is male or female.
Do you like this app? Rate it.
